descriptionHtml:
What does it do?

This mod is a retexture for the Draugr. 
I changed the Texture Map from 1024x1024 up to 2048x2048 to keep performance and 
also changed the Normal Map up to 2048 and made it a bit less bright like the default Draugr. 
Now they are a bit more dark and can hide in corners and might 
scare you a little bit more.

You can choose between 3 textures Green makes them to look more like a ghost, grey is almost Vanilla Color and brown makes them really dark. (look at the Screenshots)
author: JazzJR
